728608f-a.folder: Bloomingdale Road & Sharrotts Road, Staten Island, NY

728609f-b.text:
(1)
535 Bloomingdale Road, east side, north of Sharrotts Road. The house belonged to the Hinds family until 1898. It was later (1907) the property of Mary Riley; still later (1917) that of Charles E. Freymann. The above dates refer to maps on which the owners' names apnear. The view is north from
Sharrotts Road.
June 1, 1930
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS  N 1p,2  (E. 9S33
(2)
Another view of the house, at a later date.
May 12, 1937
P. L. Sperr
(3)
The same house, an additional view.
Octoher 12, 1935
P. L. Sperr
:RE,2Y  (PN1(7  14E .

729644f-b.text:
(1)
79 Sharrotss Road, north side, West of Bloomingdale Road, showing the old Manee House. From 1853 to 1874 the house belonged to D. Sharrott, and from 1898 to 1907 to S. Cutting. Dates refer to maps on which owners' nam:es
appear.
August 27, 1930
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, another view.
Auguat 27, 1930
P. L. Sperr
(3)
An additonal view,at a later date.
May 12, 1937
P. L. Sperr

729644f-c.folder: Sharrotts Road & Bloomingdale Road, Staten Island, NY

729645f-b.text:
(1)
183 Sharrotts Road, north side, west of Bloomingdale Road. The house was owned by E. Winant in 1853; by H. Landing in 1874; by D. Landon in 1898 and by R. H. Landon in 1907. Dates refer
to the maps on which the owners' names appear.
August 27, 1930
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, at a later date.
May 12, 1937
P. L. Sperr
